content.data: How can I set my Reports to Print in Landscape?

Go to the Windows Control Panel, Printers option. 
 
 
 Install another copy of your default printer, but give it a different name. IE: Default Printer - Landscape 
 
 
 Change the default settings for this printer to always print to Landscape. 
 
 
 In Solid, when you go to Print your Report, select this new printer (Default Printer - Landscape).
